posts.content:
Had hold of this little lot for a while now. I'd initially planned to configure it somehow to fit in my 1960 LHD walkthru samba but to be honest think it could be more hassle than it's worth. I also have the table top although the melamine doesn't match the cookers top. The back seat and cupboard is reproduction by a guy in Doncaster. The rare devon bread bin and over buddy seat cupboard is og as is the cooker unit. The cushion set is unused (one is at my trimmers still so is a complete set however you decide to fit it). I also have the correct profile lengths of oak to fit on the back of the rear seat section. Not sure how many RHD walkthru buses are out there but this would fill the back up nicely. Easycool is in good condition and includes the drip tray and walkthru pull out section. Not 100% sure how it would all work in a bus but a good start for a nice looking interior. I'd like £1850 ono for it all. One buddy seat bottom and your nearly done. Collection from East Yorkshire.

Pictures can be seen at: http://s1219.photobucket.com/user/BusjunkieUK/library/Devon%20Interior

Hi if you split I'm interested in just the cooker unit

Cheers
Billy

Not really wanting to split this lot as i'd like to sell as a whole. Reduced to £1650 for quick sale.

To confirm:

1 x Rear Seat Unit and Cupboard (includes back of seat oak top with correct mouldings)
1 x Cooker Unit and Cooker
1 x Devon Table Top
1 x Walkthru Cushion Set (unused)
1 x Easicool Fridge, drip trap and Devon Surround
1 x Walkthru Seat Cupboard with rare as hens teeth Breadbin

See link for pictures of the individual parts.

Will also throw in some scruffy wide hatch rear drawers which need some love but could be easily repaired and fitted.

£1650 collected from East Yorkshire.
Hi. Do you still have this set?

I do mate yes.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Also found the hinge for the cooker I bought separately.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Hup! Make me an offer! My dad wants his spare bedroom back!!
If you decide to split it I'd like the cooker unit. PM'd you
Could you send me some pics, I have a walk through but it's a LHD would your stuff fit?
It should fit as Craig bought it for his lhd walk through samba.

Ideally wants to be in a rhd walkthru bus Andy. Probably could be made to fit but you'd need to be good at woodwork. If you follow the link in the original post there's a good few pics on there.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Is the interior still for sale as I have a 1963 RHD american walk through and this looks like it may be ideal?
If it is still up for sale are you going to Victoria Farm at the end of the month?

Oops! Make that LHD
I'm pretty good at woodwork tho

hi would you sell the large rear hatch draws? are they just the draws?
many thanks dave.
